data.title: Unify
data.description: A platform that connects high school students with current college students to prove personalized insight on finances, major curriculums, and holistic university experiences. Built with React, Node.js, and Firebase.

data.title: Book Rank Predictor
data.description: A random forest classifier utilizing book metadata to forecast success on New York Times Best Sellers and a regression model that predicts the rank trajectory of the book across weeks. Built with Scikit-learn and Pandas.

data.title: Ddoski Game
data.description: Marketing campaign for Cal Hacks 8.0 signups around UC Berkeley campus, built with Twilio, Node.js, and Replit.

data.title: An[Ti]lles
data.description: Control system for FIRST Robotics Competition robot with vision pipeline for automated target detection, and PID controller guided drive and mechanism operation. Built with Java and OpenCV.

data.title: Titan Dev Club
data.description: Various websites and projects for the Titan Dev Club, a programming educational nonprofit.

data.title: Octavo
data.description: An application that helps musicians improve their interval recognition. Build with React, Node.js, and Firebase.

data.title: Kaligrafio
data.description: A calligraphy script explorer and text editor. Built with React, Node.js, and Firebase.
